entries.noble_npc_do_job: Let me know when you're finished, ok?
entries.noble_npc_go_home: I should have known.  You're not cut out for real work are you?
entries.noble_npc_response_3_3: Believe me, I know most of the nobles around here.  Superiority isn't something they should bring up very often, lest someone checks the facts and finds out they're all worthless.
entries.noble_player_line_3_3: That's pretty enlightened for a noble.
entries.noble_npc_response_2_3: Well, it's about time the other nobles learned that we're people just like everybody else.
entries.noble_player_line_2_3: I appreciate your honesty in the matter.
entries.noble_player_line_1_2: Oh, I'll be careful all right.
entries.noble_npc_response_1_3: My brethren don't seem to understand that they're in fact not better than everybody around them.
entries.noble_player_line_1_3: Wow, you're nice for a noble.
entries.noble_npc_response_3_2: Oh, you common masses.  You don't understand the difficulty of the life we nobles lead.
entries.noble_player_line_3_2: Maybe you should get a real job.
entries.noble_npc_response_2_2: I'm not surprised.  This is what you get for not having an education.
entries.noble_player_line_2_2: I'm too busy to talk to you.
entries.noble_npc_response_3_1: Finally, someone who shows some class.  Now get back to whatever it is you do.
entries.noble_player_line_3_1: Sorry.  Didn't mean to disturb you.
entries.noble_npc_response_2_1: This is why I don't talk to people below me.  You just don't get it.
entries.noble_player_line_2_1: I'm not sure I could go as low as you.
entries.noble_npc_response_1_1: Yes, you know.  Of a lower station?  Not as good as me?  You're not getting this are you?
entries.noble_npc_job_offer_3: Sure, I have some things you could do if you need some extra cash.
entries.noble_npc_job_offer_2: If it will get you away from me quicker I'll pay you to do something, ok?
entries.noble_npc_job_offer_1: Well, if you must do something than at least do this for me so I don't have to do it myself...
entries.noble_npc_greet_3: There's nothing worse than an arrogant noble is there?  Hi there, how are you?
entries.noble_npc_greet_2: As a noble I feel it's only fair to warn you that I'm probably smarter than you, so careful what you say.
entries.noble_npc_greet_1: I'm not used to dealing with those lower than me.  What is it you want?
entries.u25: It's quite the scandal--he ran off to join the Rebellion. Imagine!
entries.u24: Really quite tragic, dead at such a young age.
entries.u23: Doesn't it drive you mad, how you always have to
your estate? Isn't that what servants are for?
entries.u22: Such a busy day! I have to go shopping again.
entries.u21: I've been considering building a third palace here...
entries.u20: ...so of course, I had to report him for high treason.
entries.u18: So have you seen any good holodramas lately?
entries.u16: Yes, but Phen'tal was still with Joo'th Balzey at the time, and Joo'th of course was still getting over Huj, if you recall...
entries.u15: Is that a stain on my clothes? I paid a fortune for these, you know.
entries.u14: Well, my holdings in several systems are still turning a profit.
entries.u13: I lost millions gambling, of course.
entries.u12: ..and the Klatooinian says to the Wookie,
entries.u11: I never can find my chrono...
entries.u10: Oh, I've been to Coruscant many times.
entries.u9: Well, before the Senate was dissolved, I was quite important, you know.
entries.u8: Now, what have I done with my jewelry?
entries.u7: I must admit, I do think the Imperial Army goes too far on occasion.
entries.u6: And those DREADFUL Rebels have been acting up again!
entries.u5: Ah, yes, but have you heard of the Emperor's Hand? Hush now, can't talk too loud.
entries.u4: I'll never understand why sycophants like that rise so high in the Imperial court.
entries.u3: Someday he'll realize that butler of his is robbing him blind.
entries.u2: Really, as if his stinky little pet would be welcome in the right circles in Coruscant.
entries.u1: And when Lady Solia said that the import tax was going up, well, I just HAD to protest.
